attributes.action: raise all minimum wages to the same amount
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition to raise all minimum wages to the same amount, as how can the Equal Pay act 1970, stating "equal pay for equal work" be visable when people working the exact same job are payed different wages due to age. To avoid age discrimination claims it is stated that the 16-18 age bracket and 18-22 age bracket are classed as training brackets, however a person aged 18 for example may have been in a job longer than that of an over 22 yet be paid less due to minimum wage brackets. This is not "equal work for equal pay" and must be amended.
